step_feedback.feedback: Good job extending your arm overhead and opening your hand wide.  The slight inconsistencies in wrist movement between repetitions could be improved by focusing on maintaining a consistent hand position.
You're doing well getting your arm overhead.  Try to keep your elbow straighter to maximize the stretch and pump.
Remember to open your palm fully in step 3. The data shows some inconsistency in your hand opening. Focus on widening your fingers and palm completely.

The second repetition shows significant deviation in wrist and elbow movement.  Try to maintain a controlled, smooth movement throughout the exercise.  Focus on inhaling as you make a fist and exhaling as you open your hand.

exercise_summary: You showed good arm extension and hand opening in most steps of the overhead pumping exercise.  Focus on maintaining consistent hand and elbow positioning throughout each repetition and ensure a complete hand opening and closing. Remember to breathe deeply, inhaling during the fist and exhaling as you open your hand.
